Spell.Name: Cure
Spell.Description: This spell cures any diseases you may encounter.

Spell.Name: Energy Barrier
Spell.Description: This spell creates a strong magical shield around your character, protecting them from a large amount of incoming damage.

Spell.Name: Energy Blast
Spell.Description: This spell launches a blast of pure magical energy at your opponent.

Spell.Name: Fire Bolt
Spell.Description: This spell launches magical fire at your opponent.

Spell.Name: Fireball
Spell.Description: This spell launches a large ball of magical fire at your opponent.

Spell.Name: Heal Major Wounds
Spell.Description: This spell restores a large amount of health to your character.

Spell.Name: Heal Medium Wounds
Spell.Description: This spell restores a medium amount of health to your character.

Spell.Name: Ice Bolt
Spell.Description: This spell launches magical ice at your opponent.

Spell.Name: Lightning Bolt
Spell.Description: This spell blasts a bolt of lightning at your opponent.

Spell.Name: Shield
Spell.Description: This spell creates a magical shield around your character, protecting them from some incoming damage.

Spell.Name: Smite
Spell.Description: This spell deals holy magic damage against your opponent.

Spell.Name: Triple Arrow
Spell.Description: This spell creates 3 magical arrows which fly at your target.
